operations.summary: Get a single setting from a bundle.

parameters.name: bundle
parameters.description: This field represents a configuration file that contains a bundle of settings.

responseMessages.message: The specified configuration bundle is unavailable.

operations.notes: This is an advanced operation with minimal validation. Incorrect use of this operation can harm the integrity of your PingFederate configuration. Please ensure you have specified the correct bundle name, setting ID, and setting value before invoking this operation.

parameters.name: bundle
parameters.description: This field represents a configuration file that contains a bundle of settings.

responseMessages.message: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid fields.
The specified configuration bundle is unavailable.

operations.notes: This is an advanced operation with minimal validation. Incorrect use of this operation can harm the integrity of your PingFederate configuration. Please ensure you have specified the correct bundle name and setting ID before invoking this operation.

parameters.name: bundle
parameters.description: This field represents a configuration file that contains a bundle of settings.

responseMessages.message: The specified configuration bundle is unavailable.

operations.summary: Get all settings from a bundle.

parameters.name: bundle
parameters.description: This field represents a configuration file that contains a bundle of settings.

responseMessages.message: The specified configuration bundle is unavailable.

ApiResult.description: Details on the result of the operation.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors, if any.

fieldPath.description: The path to the model field to which the error relates, if one exists.

ConfigStoreBundle.description: List of all configuration settings in a bundle.

id.description: The id of the configuration setting.

stringValue.description: The value of the configuration setting. This is used when the setting has a single string value.

listValue.description: The list of values for the configuration setting. This is used when the setting has a list of string values.

mapValue.description: The map of key/value pairs for the configuration setting. This is used when the setting has a map of string keys and values.

type.description: The type of configuration setting. This could be a single string, list of strings, or map of string keys and values.
